com.github.jlgrock.closuretoolslibrary.utils.logging
[Groovy] Class Log4jOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      com.github.jlgrock.closuretoolslibrary.utils.logging.Log4jOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
final class Log4jOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream

An output stream that ports output to log4j. Especially useful when porting System.err and System.out streams.

Property Summary
static int DEFAULT_BUFFER_LENGTH

The initial number of bytes in the buffer.
static java.lang.String LINE_SEPERATOR

The character used as the line separator constant.
byte[] buffer

The internal buffer where data is stored.
int count

The number of bytes in the buffer.
boolean isClosed

The boolean to keep track if the output stream has been closed.
Level level

The level to use when writing to the logger.
Logger logger

The logger to log to.
